Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements InputEventListener
Main controller that coordinates the game logic and view. Implements InputEventListener to handle player input events and manages the interaction between the game board, score, level, and GUI components. Supports both classic and sprint game modes.

    • GameController

      public GameController(GuiController c)
      Constructs a GameController with default classic game mode.
      Parameters:
      c - the GUI controller to coordinate with

    • GameController

      public GameController(GuiController c, GameMode mode)
      Constructs a GameController with the specified game mode. Initializes the board, sets up UI bindings, and configures sprint mode if applicable.
      Parameters:
      c - the GUI controller to coordinate with
      mode - the game mode to use (CLASSIC or SPRINT)

  • Method Details

    • onDownEvent

      public DownData onDownEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the down movement event, moving the brick down one cell. May trigger row clearing, score updates, and game state changes. Handles the down movement event. Moves the brick down, merges it when blocked, clears rows, updates score and level, and checks for game over or sprint win conditions.
      Specified by:
      onDownEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing event type and source information
      Returns:
      DownData containing information about cleared rows and updated view data

    • onLeftEvent

      public ViewData onLeftEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the left movement event, moving the brick left one cell. Handles the left movement event by moving the current brick left.
      Specified by:
      onLeftEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing event type and source information
      Returns:
      ViewData containing the updated brick position and view information

    • onRightEvent

      public ViewData onRightEvent(MoveEvent event)

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      ViewData containing the updated brick position and view information

    • onRotateEvent

      public ViewData onRotateEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the rotation event, rotating the brick counter-clockwise. Handles the rotation event by rotating the current brick counter-clockwise.
      Specified by:
      onRotateEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing event type and source information
      Returns:
      ViewData containing the updated brick rotation and view information

    • createNewGame

      public void createNewGame()
      Resets the game to start a new game. Clears the board and resets game state. Resets the game to start a new game. Clears the board, resets the level, and updates the game speed.
      Specified by:
      createNewGame in interface InputEventListener

    • onHardDropEvent

      public DownData onHardDropEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the hard drop event, instantly dropping the brick to its lowest position. May trigger row clearing, score updates, and game state changes. Handles the hard drop event. Instantly drops the brick to its lowest position, merges it, clears rows, and checks for game over or sprint win conditions.
      Specified by:
      onHardDropEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - the move event containing event type and source information
      Returns:
      DownData containing information about cleared rows and updated view data
